tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NNP Tonia)) (VP (VP (VBG coming) (PP (IN into) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN house)))) (CC and) (VP (VBG scaring) (ADVP (NP (DT the) (NN shit)) (IN out)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP me))))) (. .)))
